pages.text: It's time to get better croparias !
To do so, you will need to discover a new way to craft items
You can put an elematilius in a cauldron full of water to obtain some liquid elematilius. Then, you should be able to fill some bottles with it.
This stone is able to manipulate the elematilius when applied with a filled bottle.
Now, just drop a croparia on the infusor to obtain a croparia T2.
You can repeat it until the maximum tier : croparia T7 !
Each tier of croparia will grant you access to better seeds.
